# pdf codes


## cheat folder 

```{python}
# Convert to PDF, simple as pdf keeps tag
import subprocess

# Render to PDF using Quarto
subprocess.run(['quarto', 'render', 'cheat_sheet_lv_one.qmd', '--to', 'pdf'])

print("PDF document 'cheat_sheet_lv_one.pdf' created.")
```
